channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenHarmony -- OpenHarmony
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenHarmony -- OpenHarmony

item.title: CVE-2023-25947|2024-08-02T11:39:06.548Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description: The bundle management subsystem within OpenHarmony-v3.1.4 and prior versions has a null pointer reference vulnerability which local attackers can exploit this vulnerability to cause a DoS attack to the system when installing a malicious HAP package.

item.title: CVE-2023-0035|2024-08-02T04:54:32.595Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description: softbus_client_stub in communication subsystem within OpenHarmony-v3.0.5 and prior versions has an authentication bypass vulnerability which allows an "SA relay attack".Local attackers can bypass authentication and attack other SAs with high privilege.

item.title: CVE-2023-4753|2024-08-02T07:37:59.961Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description: OpenHarmony v3.2.1 and prior version has a system call function usage error. Local attackers can crash kernel by the error input.

item.title: CVE-2023-43612|2024-08-02T19:44:44.154Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description: in OpenHarmony v3.2.2 and prior versions allow a local attacker arbitrary file read and write through improper preservation of permissions.

item.title: CVE-2023-46708|2024-08-02T20:53:20.895Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description: in OpenHarmony v3.2.4 and prior versions allow a local attacker arbitrary code execution in any apps through use after free.

item.title: CVE-2023-3116|2024-08-02T06:48:07.106Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description: in OpenHarmony v3.2.2 and prior versions allow a local attacker get confidential information or rewrite sensitive file through incorrect default permissions.

item.title: CVE-2023-43756|2024-08-02T19:52:11.030Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description: in OpenHarmony v3.2.4 and prior versions allow a local attacker causes information leak through out-of-bounds Read.

item.title: CVE-2023-47216|2024-08-02T21:01:22.921Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description: in OpenHarmony v3.2.2 and prior versions allow a local attacker cause DOS through occupy all resources

item.title: CVE-2023-22436|2024-08-02T10:07:06.546Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description:
The kernel subsystem function check_permission_for_set_tokenid within OpenHarmony-v3.1.5 and prior versions has an
UAF vulnerability which local attackers can exploit this vulnerability to escalate the privilege to root.

item.title: CVE-2023-6045|2024-08-02T08:21:17.037Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description: in OpenHarmony v3.2.2 and prior versions allow a local attacker arbitrary code execution in pre-installed apps through type confusion.

item.title: CVE-2023-0083|2024-08-02T05:02:42.970Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description:
The ArKUI framework subsystem within OpenHarmony-v3.1.5 and prior versions,
OpenHarmony-v3.0.7 and prior versions
has an Improper Input Validation vulnerability which local attackers can exploit this vulnerability to send malicious data, causing the current application to crash.

item.title: CVE-2023-22301|2024-08-02T10:07:06.145Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description:
The kernel subsystem hmdfs within OpenHarmony-v3.1.5 and prior versions has an
arbitrary memory accessing vulnerability which network attackers can launch a remote attack to obtain kernel memory data of the target system.

item.title: CVE-2023-45734|2024-08-02T20:29:32.298Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description: in OpenHarmony v3.2.4 and prior versions allow an adjacent attacker arbitrary code execution through out-of-bounds write.

item.title: CVE-2023-42774|2024-08-02T19:30:24.505Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description: in OpenHarmony v3.2.2 and prior versions allow a local attacker get confidential information through incorrect default permissions.

item.title: CVE-2023-24465|2024-08-02T10:56:04.224Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description:
Communication Wi-Fi subsystem within OpenHarmony-v3.1.4 and prior versions, OpenHarmony-v3.0.7 and prior versions
has a null pointer reference vulnerability which local attackers can exploit this vulnerability to cause the current application to crash.

item.title: CVE-2023-46705|2024-08-02T20:53:21.599Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description: in OpenHarmony v3.2.2 and prior versions allow a local attacker causes system information leak through type confusion.

item.title: CVE-2023-47217|2024-08-02T21:01:22.826Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description: in OpenHarmony v3.2.2 and prior versions allow a local attacker cause DOS through buffer overflow.

item.title: CVE-2023-46100|2024-08-02T20:37:39.265Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description: in OpenHarmony v3.2.2 and prior versions allow a local attacker get sensitive buffer information through use of uninitialized resource.

item.title: CVE-2023-0036|2024-08-02T04:54:32.597Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description: platform_callback_stub in misc subsystem within OpenHarmony-v3.0.5 and prior versions has an authentication bypass vulnerability which allows an "SA relay attack".Local attackers can bypass authentication and attack other SAs with high privilege.

item.title: CVE-2024-31078|2024-08-02T01:46:03.910Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description: in OpenHarmony v4.0.0 and prior versions allow a local attacker cause service crash through NULL pointer dereference.
